section.title: Adding a new Menu Item: "New MyDocument"
section.p: The Menubars can be found within the directory config/menus. Add the "New MyDocument" menu item to the appropriate menubar:

section.title: Adding usecase "create" to the sitemap
section.p: The pipelines of the usecases are located within usecase.xmap:
section.source:
<map:pipeline> <map:match pattern="*/*/*/*/*/index.html"> <map:match type="lenya-usecase" pattern="create"> <map:match type="lenya-step" pattern="showscreen"> <map:generate type="serverpages" src="../../content/authoring/parent-child.xsp"/> <map:transform src="../../xslt/authoring/create.xsl"/> <map:serialize type="html"/> </map:match>
<map:match type="lenya-step" pattern="execute"> <map:act type="parent-child"> <map:redirect-to uri="{parent_uri}" session="true"/> </map:act> <map:redirect-to uri="index.html?lenya.usecase=create&lenya.step=showscreen&status=failed" session="true"/> </map:match> </map:match> </map:match> </map:pipeline>

section.title: Create doctypes.xconf
section.p: The file doctypes.xconf is supposed to be located within the directory config/doctypes.

section.title: Create a sample document
section.p: The sample documents are located within the directory config/doctypes/samples.
